Question: Arti AR CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Arti AR

Product: Arti AR CES 2024

- Augmented reality and XR technology showcased at CES 2024
- Focus on live video, video presentation, and video conferencing
- Emphasis on engaging and memorable online meetings and presentations
- Integration of 3D video and augmented reality technologies
- Presence at Eureka Park, Venitian Expo, Booth #61701
